extendedInfo.description: Free Mobile Banking for Android devices. With Mobile Banking from America First, you can perform financial transactions on the move â¦ without making a trip to the credit union. Access Mobile Banking with the same secure credentials as Online Banking, all optimized specifically for your Android device.  America Firstâs Mobile Banking gives you the ability to:- Deposit checks using the camera in your device -- without visiting a branch or ATM.  - Check balances and transfer funds within your account or to another America First member.  - View your transaction history, including those that are pending.- Pay bills from your mobile device using free Bill Pay.- Log in to multiple accounts.  - Find ATMs and branches quickly and easily.  Privacy Policy:  https://www.americafirst.com/about/disclosures/membership-agreement.cfm#privacyPolicyTerms and Conditions: https://www.americafirst.com/about/disclosures/mobile-banking-service-agreement.cfmMobile Banking users must enroll in Online Banking.  Deposits subject to verification and not available for immediate withdrawal. See terms in app for limits/availability and other restrictions.  Some features are available for eligible members and accounts only.  America First Mobile Banking is free to access but messaging and data rates apply.

reviews.title: Update gets 5 stars
reviews.comment: UI actually fits the screen and mobile deposits work. Thanks for the update. Looks sharp
reviews.author: Omar Vasquez

reviews.title: It\'s finally a smart app.
reviews.comment: They fixed everything with the newest update. It looks and feels solid. All they need now is payment loan reminders. Just a thought. Great work AFCU Dev.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Thanks for the update!!!!
reviews.comment: Love this app
reviews.author: Brandi Lee

reviews.title: Not formatted properly
reviews.comment: Latest update fixed problems I had been having on my galaxy s4 and nexus 7.
reviews.author: Nathan Blank

reviews.title: Pretty lame
reviews.comment: Goes along with their other backwards, behind the times, way of doing things. For example it warns me every time that I have a non-system keyboard and doesn\'t even tell it to switch to the number pad so I can enter my PIN. Once in, there\'s no mobile check deposits for business. Bill pay on business is entirely separate, so no support on mobile. Just backward and behind many other credit unions. Will be switching to Mountain America, which does much better with tech and security, in the near future.
reviews.author: Tevya Washburn

reviews.title: Issues resolved
reviews.comment: Works great,  able to take care of all of my banking even now that we live nowhere near a branch.  The interface is completely fixed!  An awesome app from an awesome credit union. Thanks for listening and getting the app fixed!
reviews.author: Jesse Anderson

reviews.title: much better
reviews.comment: I\'m happy with new afcu version
reviews.author: Kiesha Pham

reviews.title: Insert cuss word here
reviews.comment: Deposits doesnt work with s4. Horrible app

reviews.title: Update for the win
reviews.comment: Latest update now works properly with Nexus 7 :-)  five stars
reviews.author: Daran Ottley

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Great for when on the go. Way easy to use

reviews.title: love this app!
reviews.comment: I love that I am able to make mobile deposits! This app is my most used app I have!

reviews.title: Galaxy s2. Can\'t do Deposits
reviews.comment: Would not let me deposit check. Did procedure about 4 x\'s and every time I got to the very end it would say loading then boot me out to login again.

reviews.comment: Thx for the fix
